comments.text: I don't know under what component to file this, but we have 3-4 shells in the tree. The JS shell, the xpconnect shell, the ipcshell, and I have probably forgotten one. We should merge all these into one shell library and extensions or something like that.
comments.creator: gal@uci.edu
comments.author: gal@uci.edu

comments.raw_text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> Paul, can I interest you in this?

Slightly interested, but I've committed to too much stuff right now. If this still needs doing in a few months, I'll take a look.
